CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 28, 1960, pg. 15, reads: "Cited - Surprise of the morning at the Hilton Hotel breakfast on Sunday, given by the Pittsburgh B. and P. Women's Club was the citation given Mrs. Florence Ball-Jones, second from right, only charter member of the organization.  Left to right: Mrs. Robert L. Vann, mistress of ceremonies; Mrs. Marion E. Bryant, who made the presentation; Atty. Paul F. Jones and Mrs. Daisy E. Lampkin, dais guests. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Florence Ball-Jones receiving citation from Marion E. Bryant, with, from left: Jessie Vann, Paul F. Jones, and Daisy E. Lampkin, looking on, standing in Hilton Hotel
